name: Parkour Life - Faded World.
description:
Parkour Life Faded World is a first game from Parkour Life series.

JUMP ON PLATFORMS AND GET INTO RADIOACTIVE AREA TO WIN!

Also you can watch for easter eggs (because jumping and sliding on the platforms will be so BORING) 

I WILL MAKE A DELUXE VERSION OF THIS GAME........... I TELL IT TO GUYS WHO ENDED THIS GAME!

                                                                                                                              SzymsooonGames inc.
